name: whereLeb
tag_list: lebanese-directory, lebanon, reviews, mobile, social, sharing, location-aware, places, address, beirut, pubs, restaurants, nightclubs, entertainment, food, nightlife, doctors, engineers
overview:
The whereLeb service was founded in 2010 to help people in Lebanon find and locate local businesses and professional individuals like restaurants, dentists, shopping places, banks, nurseries…

The whereLeb mission is to share what people have to say about businesses and professionals they work with.

whereLeb.com users can write reviews of businesses or individuals, rate them and share their experiences with their friends and all other users of the service.

whereLeb also provides a mobile application with rich location based services and added value features including search, entertainment, events, movies and many others.
